meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The ternary necklace had three beautiful gems.
meanings.sent2: The ternary puzzle required solving three different sections.
meanings.sent3: The ternary team of friends always stuck together.
meanings.sent4: The ternary colors of the flag symbolized unity, peace, and strength.
meanings.sent5: The ternary structure of the building stood out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: The trio formed a ternary of talented musicians.
meanings.sent2: The ternary of siblings always played together in the park.
meanings.sent3: The ternary of flavors in the ice cream cone delighted her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The ternary of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ternary of books on the shelf caught her attention immediately.

meanings.definition: A number system with a base of three.
meanings.sent1: In the ternary system, numbers are represented using only three digits.
meanings.sent2: The computer used a ternary code to process information efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The aliens communicated with humans using a ternary language.
meanings.sent4: The ancient civilization developed a ternary counting system.
meanings.sent5: The ternary numeral system fascinated the mathematicians with its simplicity.
